channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Looks like old tarmac in drain probably from resurfacing, 7th May
item.description:
Drain between 62 & 64 church street. This drain always struggles to cope with heavy rain at the best of times and floods the drive of 64

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 64, Church Street, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Grass verge and hedge blocking visibility, 7th May
item.description:
Hedge and grass verge going through Knightsbridge. It has become very dangerous getting out of slate mill lane. The visibility has got bad on the left coming from Coombe Hill and the other way towards Cheltenham is getting bad. With bad visibility and the speed the cars come down the road, there will be an accident.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Footways Slabs problem, 7th May
item.description:

item.title: Pothole in the middle of the road, 7th May
item.description:
There is a nasty pothole (after the long line of potholes) on the Hight St. It is on the west-bound side of the road. No paint around it, and it is hard for motorists to avoid as it is often in shadow and hard to see. It needs fixing, as does much of this road. It's like a 3rd world country standard road, a disgrace.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 54, High Street, Noverton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fissures up to 50-60mm wide, large enough to trap a shoe heel., 6th May
item.description:
The fissure in the pavement adjacent house number 30 Wards Road, and around that number - near to householders' wall..
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 30, Wards Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Other damage to pavement i.e. cobbles, raised mound/surface

item.title: Very poor uneven road surface with deep ridges which resulted in me loosing control of my bike resulting in broken bones and collapsed lung, 6th May
item.description:
Coordinates 51.94573 N , 2.07341 W

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stoke Orchard Road, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Channels dug across the road poorly filled in, 6th May
item.description:
Channels dug across the road have been repeatedly filled in badly and sink within a couple of days of refilling. They need sorting properly, this has been going on for months now, they are dangerous when sunk and damaging the vehicles. How many more times does this have to be reported before this issue is fixed???
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A435, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet
